TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Brushes extends System.Object

summary.span: 所有标准颜色的画笔。

span.span: Brushes for all the standard colors.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含`static`返回的只读属性对象的属性名称一致的颜色。The class contains `static` read-only properties that return a object of the color indicated by the property name. 通常不需要显式释放此类中属性返回的画笔，除非它用于构造新的画笔。You typically do not have to explicitly dispose of the brush returned by a property in this class, unless it is used to construct a new brush. 表示通过此类中画笔的颜色的详细信息，请参阅[按名称的颜色](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332)。For more information about the colors represented by the brushes in this class, see [Colors by Name](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的成员类以填充。The following code example demonstrates the how to use a member of the class to fill a . 此示例应使用的 Windows 窗体。This example should be used with a Windows Form. 将此代码粘贴到窗体，并在处理该窗体时调用此方法事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste this code into a form and call this method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as .
